summary:
This mod adds a huge room filled with everything a collector (like me) might need.  The museum is connected to 12 major locations of Skyrim. 
Most house mods were crashing my game, so i made my own and avoided all the things that cause problems (navmesh - so no followers, bookshelfs - got chests instead (much better anyway))
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/9192/titlemuseum.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/769/museumz.png[/img][/center]

[img]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/5342/description3.png [/img]
This mod adds a huge room filled with everything a collector (like me)  might need.  The museum is connected to 12 major locations of Skyrim. 
Most house mods were crashing my game, so i made my own and avoided all the things that cause problems, like bookshelfs - got chests instead (much better anyway)

[b][color=8BB381]Whats inside?[/color][/b] 
•            12 teleports (small red buttons)  in Whiterun,  Windhelm, Winterhold, Falkreath, Riverwood, Riften, Rorikstead, Morthal, Dawnstar, Markarth, Helgen and Solitude.  The buttons are just beside you when you fast travel to these towns.  Some on the ground and some on nearby wall or on steps to Jarls house. 
•	14 Male mannequins
•	11 Female mannequins
•	36 Weapon Racks (upgraded to 75 in v2)
•	15 Weapon Plaques
•	30 Shield Plaques
•	 7 Weapon Display Cases
•	18 Dagger Display Cases
•	Anvil – Grindstone – Workbench – Smelter – Tanning rack – Alchemy lab – Enchanter Table –  - Cooking Pot
•	Bed
•	Dragon Priest Masks Holder
•	8 Labeled Chests for: Smithing – Alchemy Ingredients – Books – Skill Books – Scrolls – Soul gems – Enchanting items – Potions
•	12 Unlabeled Chests 
•	Jewelry Box

(everything is empty,  so no spoilers) 
[img]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/2537/qanda.png[/img]
Q:How do i get inside?
A: Use one of the 12 teleports in each major city.

Q: Can my follower get in too? 
Yes, I got it working (finely). If they ever stop somewhere inside, just walk to them and then walk slowly, they should follow. 

Q: There are no bookshelfs? 
A: Well, I made them,  but they were crashing the game.  Anyway,  in my opinion the bookshelfs are overrated. I use chest for books and its much better as the books are all in one place and alphabetically sorted too.  The SKILL BOOKS chest in the museum is there,  because i use mod that lets me pick up skill books without reading them,  so i can save them for higher levels.  [url= http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8781] PowerFang\'s Identified Books [/url]

Q: Any conflicts with other mods? 
A: Only if some mod changes the cities. My museum still will be there, but some of the teleports in cities might have been erased by other mod.

Q: My  mannequins are black.
A: Fast save and fast load,  that shoud fix it. (there is another bug with mannequins that wount allow mannequins to face north)  took me 3hours to figure this one out. 

Q: For some reason Daedric Armor on Female Mannequins causes the game to crash. 
A: I seriously don’t know why. It happens to me, but had no other reports. Just try it for yourself. Male mannequins are ok.

[img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/4646/instalation.png[/img]
[center][b][color=FF4500]!!!!  IMPORTANT  !!!!  [/center]If you are upgrading from version 1, you MUST get all your things from the room first. Then travel outside the museum and save. Exit Skyrim. Paste new version in and override. Otherwise you lose everything!!!![/color][/b]

[img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/2705/historyky.png [/img]
Version 2 - 17/5/2012
Added 39 weapon racks (And its still not enough)
Fixed the lighting (Its a bit darker now)
Some plaques and weapon racks didnt allow to extract weapons (Fixed now)
Navmeshed part of the room, so followers can now go inside. (If they dont follow, just walk slower)
Some other small bugs



So, i think thats all.  If you enjoy Malkavs museum,  please show your appreciation and press that button to [color=red]ENDORSE or RATE[/color] this mod.  Thank you. 

Malkav
